title: Ep. 391 - Trump's Crystal Ball
description:
A man in NYC gets beaten for wearing a MAGA hat, Elijah Cummings has his house broken into just hours before Trump tweets about the dangers of living in Baltimore, and finally the Mailbag! Date: 08-02-2019
